          <title>
            <string language="no">Fargeblanding</string>
            <string language="en">Colour blend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe Mischung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mélange de couleur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mistura da cor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Miscela di colore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μίγμα χρώματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mezcla del color</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Hvilke farger kan du få frem av bare de tre fargene rød, grønn og blå? Prøv deg frem!</string>
            <string language="en">What colours can you blend by using red,green and blue? Try !</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">primærfarger</string>
            <string language="en">primary colour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">primærfargene</string>
            <string language="en">primary colours</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welche Farben können Sie mischen, indem Sie Rot, 
Grün und Blau verwenden? Versuch!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelles couleurs pouvez-vous mélanger en 
utilisant le rouge, le vert et le bleu ? Essai !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que cores pode você misturar usando o vermelho, o
verde e o azul? Tentativa!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che colori potete mescolare usando il colore 
rosso, il verde e l'azzurro? Prova!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τί χρώματα μπορείτε να συνδυάσετε με τη χρησιμοποίηση
του κοκκίνου, πράσινος και μπλε; Προσπαθήστε!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué colores puede usted mezclar usando rojo, 
verde y el azul? ¡Intento!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Primärfarbe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
